translation.en: Family is everything, no?
Now, do you love your son?
Now, do you understand?
You have a $10 million insurance policy. I know that.
translation.es: Tiene una póliza por diez millones de dólares. Yo lo sé.

translation.en: Georgina! Obey me. I will love you. Come on.
- That's how it works, huh? - That's right.
She got a sister?
How's business?
translation.es: ¿Qué tal te va con el negocio?

translation.en: The Japanese are here in a big way.
translation.es: Los japoneses tienen una gran presencia aquí.

translation.en: Cheap labor, factory space, but they feel a lot safer living over the border in El Paso.
translation.es: Tienen mano de obra barata aquí... ...pero prefieren vivir en El Paso, pasada la frontera.

translation.en: I ferry them back and forth. They think I'm John Wayne.
translation.es: Los paso en ferry de un lado a otro. Creen que soy John Wayne.

translation.en: - I live like a king down here. - Yes, you do.
translation.es: -Aquí vivo como un rey. -Sí, ya veo.

translation.en: - You been working? - Yeah. No.
No. I've been moving around. You know. Colombia, a couple of places I can't name.
translation.es: He ido aquí y allá. Estuve en Colombia, en un par de lugares que ni me acuerdo.

translation.en: Nothing catches my fancy.
You think God'll forgive us for what we've done?
translation.es: ¿Crees que Dios nos perdonará por lo que hicimos?

translation.en: - No. - You don't?
Me either.
- How long you staying? - I don't know, I just, you know...
translation.es: -¿Por cuánto tiempo te quedas? -No lo sé, sólo...

translation.en: I wanted to see you, Ray, see how you're doing.
translation.es: Quería verte, Ray, ver qué tal te va.

translation.en: I just came by on impulse.
I could do with some impulse.
translation.es: A mí me haría falta un poco de impulso.

translation.en: What happened?
Family paid the ransom, then they sent the kid home after a couple of days.
translation.es: La familia pagó el rescate... ...y devolvieron al chico un par de días más tarde.

translation.en: Minus an ear, of course.
Now every mother in Mexico City with money wants bigger bodyguards.
translation.es: Todas las madres adineradas... ...quieren el mejor guardaespaldas, mi esposa incluida.

translation.en: - My own wife included. - I hate to break it to you, but she's right.
translation.es: ...quieren el mejor guardaespaldas, mi esposa incluida. Odio decírtelo, pero ella tiene razón.

translation.en: She's right.
translation.es: Odio decírtelo, pero ella tiene razón.

translation.en: Look, Sammy, all my clients have kidnap and ransom insurance.
translation.es: Mira, Sammy, todos mis clientes tienen seguro contra secuestro y rescate.

translation.en: I have a policy. AIG. My dad gave it to me.
translation.es: Yo tengo una póliza con AIG. Me la compró mi papá.

translation.en: Yeah, I know. I got it for your dad.
translation.es: Lo sé. Yo se la conseguí.

translation.en: But what'll you do in 60 days when you can't renew it because you have no bodyguard?
translation.es: Pero en 60 días no podrás renovarla porque no tienes guardaespaldas.

translation.en: I know. I had to let Emilio go.
translation.es: Lo sé. Tuve que echar a Emilio.

translation.en: Well, you gotta please Lisa. I mean, ass like that's hard to find.
translation.es: Bueno, tienes que darle el gusto a Lisa. Culos como ese son difíciles de encontrar.

translation.en: Look.
A bodyguard's like anything else. You get what you pay for, okay?
translation.es: Un guardaespaldas es como todo. Todo depende de lo que pagues, ¿sí?

translation.en: You could do this. Get one that's got a decent résumé.
translation.es: Puedes hacer esto. Busca a alguien con un currículum decente.

translation.en: We're not looking for goddamn Superman, right? Get someone cheap.
translation.es: No queremos a Superman, ¿verdad? Busca algo barato.

translation.en: So you renew the policy, and then fire the prick for whatever, incompetence.
translation.es: Renuevas la póliza, y luego lo despides por cualquier cosa, incompetencia.

translation.en: All kidding aside, the most important thing is that your daughter goes back to school,
translation.es: Bueno, en serio, lo principal es que tu hija vuelva al colegio...

translation.en: and that your wife gets to save face.
translation.es: ...y que tu esposa mantenga su estatus.

translation.en: This way you won't be the only unprotected family in the neighborhood.
translation.es: Así no serás el único sin protección en el vecindario.

translation.en: That's right, a bodyguard. Your Spanish is good enough.
translation.es: Eso es, un guardaespaldas. Hablas suficiente español.

translation.en: - You're crazy. - You even look the part.
In my state, I couldn't guard a corpse.
translation.es: Así, no podría proteger ni a un cadáver.

translation.en: It's rich guys flashing their cash. It's all for show. Nothing's gonna happen.
translation.es: A esos tipos les gusta mostrar su dinero. No pasará nada.

translation.en: Yeah? You think they'd hire a drunk, a has- been?
translation.es: ¿Sí? ¿Crees que contratarían a un borracho, un fantasma del pasado?

translation.en: You have to keep it under control.
What if there was, you know... Just, say, a kidnapping attempt? What do I do then?
translation.es: ¿Qué pasa si se produjera un intento de secuestro? ¿Qué haría?

translation.en: You do your best. They're not gonna be paying you enough to perform miracles.
translation.es: Haz lo que puedas. No te van a pagar lo suficiente como para que hagas milagros.

translation.en: It's not exactly a scam, Crease. Even at half speed, you're pretty damn good.
translation.es: No es exactamente un embuste, Crease. Incluso a media máquina, eres excelente.

translation.en: Yeah. A bodyguard's gotta be close to people, though.
translation.es: Sí. Un guardaespaldas tiene que hablar todo el tiempo.

translation.en: They talk all the time. You know I'm no good at that.
translation.es: Un guardaespaldas tiene que hablar todo el tiempo. Y sabes que no soy bueno para eso.

translation.en: You'll be the silent type. They're gonna appreciate that.
translation.es: Serás del tipo de los que les gusta el silencio. Les parecerá bien.

translation.en: Bodyguard. So who's the guy?
Samuel Ramos. He's a young guy.
translation.es: Samuel Ramos. Es un tipo joven.

translation.en: - He owns one of the plants in Juárez. - Yeah?
translation.es: Es dueño de una de las plantas en Juárez. ¿Sí?

translation.en: The Jap car industry is in the toilet.
translation.es: La industria de autos japoneses no va bien.

translation.en: He's trying to persuade Ford to partner with him.
translation.es: La industria de autos japoneses no va bien. Quiere que Ford entre como socio.

translation.en: I think he's in trouble. His family lives in Mexico City.
translation.es: Creo que está en problemas. Su familia vive en Ciudad de México.

translation.en: He asked me if I knew anybody he could trust.
translation.es: Me preguntó si conocía a alguien de confianza.

translation.en: - And you thought of me? - Yeah.
Take a job, Crease. Breathe some air.
translation.es: Acepta el trabajo, Crease. Relájate un poco.

translation.en: Then decide if you want to stick around.
translation.es: Y luego decides si quieres quedarte por aquí.

translation.en: Besides, I'm glad to see you, you know? I got nobody to talk to down here.
translation.es: Además, me alegra verte. No tengo a nadie aquí con quién hablar.

translation.en: Listen, my wife wants someone presentable and polite.
translation.es: Mire, mi esposa quiere a alguien presentable y educado.

translation.en: You'll be the fifth candidate she sees this week.

translation.en: Your résumé's quite impressive.
Sixteen years of military experience, extensive counter- terrorism work.
translation.es: Dieciséis años de experiencia militar e intensa... ...participación en la lucha contra el terrorismo.

translation.en: I'm surprised anybody could afford you. What's the catch?

translation.en: I drink.
How does that affect you?
Coordination, reaction time.
If top professionals try to kidnap your daughter, I'll do the best I can,
translation.es: Si profesionales intentan secuestrar a su hija, haré todo lo que pueda...

translation.en: but the service will be on a par with the pay.
translation.es: ...pero mis servicios se equipararán a la paga.

translation.en: What if amateurs try it?
I'd probably kill them. Is that likely?
No.
No one is to know about your drinking. That includes my wife.

Lisa!
My wife Lisa. And this is John Creasy.

It's all in there.
- Would you like a drink? - Yes. Jack and water would be good.

Pita? Pita.

Thank you.
Just like that?
I think it's nice that he's an American.
I think it's terrific. Are you sure?
Thank you.
Thank you.
I feel better now.

I don't know.

Bye, Creasy.
Bye, Bird.

Sure.

Creasy Bear.

Business. For Toyota, for Ford.

Pita likes him.
Pita loves school. Pita would love Count Dracula if he took her back there, honey.

translation.en: Okay?
Hey. Are you okay?
- I don't know. - Okay?

That's right, that's right. Come on.
All right.
Home to Emilio.
You're home free, baby.

My last bodyguard left. Somebody gave him more money than we could.

There were 24 kidnappings in Mexico City in the last six days.
translation.es: Hubo 24 secuestros en Ciudad de México... ...en los seis últimos días. Cuatro por día.

translation.en: - Four a day. - Yeah? Twenty- four?
translation.es: ...en los seis últimos días. Cuatro por día. -¿Sí? ¿Veinticuatro? -Sí. ¿Qué te parece eso?

translation.es: -¿Sí? ¿Veinticuatro? -Sí. ¿Qué te parece eso? -Creo que sabes más de lo que deberías. -Bueno, gracias.

- What? - You have to sign in. Show them your ID.
Come on.
Right there.
Pita! It's so good to have you back.

- Hurry. Class is about to begin. Go, go. - Bye, Creasy.

translation.en: No offense, but I regret that your profession needs to exist.

Do you ever see the hand of God in what you do?

The Bible says, Be not overcome of evil...

translation.en: But overcome evil with good.

translation.en: I am the sheep that got lost, Madre.
When you were a kid, Creasy, did you like school?

translation.en: - I don't remember. - You don't remember?
translation.es: No lo recuerdo. -¿No lo recuerdas? -No, no lo recuerdo.

translation.en: No, I don't remember. No, I didn't like it.
translation.es: -¿No lo recuerdas? -No, no lo recuerdo. -No, no me gustaba. -¿Por qué no?

translation.en: Why not?
Because it wasn't a school like yours, Pita. There was no Sister Anna.
translation.es: Porque no era un colegio como el tuyo. No había una Hermana Anna.

translation.en: Were you unhappy?
Being unhappy, that's a state of mind. I really don't remember.

translation.en: What happened to your hand?
- It's a birth defect. - No, it's not.

translation.en: Look, no more questions, okay?

No, no, no.
I'm being paid to be your bodyguard. Look at me.

- No crying. - I'm not crying.
Well, don't start.

Yeah, come in.
Mr. Creasy.
I just wanted to make sure you have everything you need.

Is the food all right? Because Maria told me you didn't eat.

Yeah, sometimes.
Does it help? Yeah, sometimes.
- Can I talk to you for a minute? - Sure.
How are you doing with Pita?
Fine.
As soon as she figures out that I'm not her new toy, it'll be fine.

translation.en: - She told me about that. - Okay.
- You don't have children, do you? - I told you I didn't.

translation.en: Well, they can be tenacious when they want something.

translation.en: Okay.
But you're paying me to protect her, not to be her friend, right?

translation.en: So...
Look, maybe this isn't gonna work out.
translation.es: Mire, esto tal vez no funcione.

translation.es: Tal vez su marido deba encontrar a alguien un poco más sociable.

translation.en: No, you're right.
You're being paid to protect her.

translation.en: And I'm confident that you'll do that.
translation.es: Y confío en que eso es lo que hará.

translation.en: I'll be coming with you tomorrow. I hope that's all right.

a bullet always tells the truth?

I know, failure to fire and...
You know, I pulled the trigger and click, nothing.

a bullet always tells the truth.
Crease? You all right?
Yeah.

Creasy?

translation.en: Anything goes wrong, you put it to his head,
translation.es: Si algo sale mal, le apuntas a la cabeza...

translation.en: you pull the trigger, all right?
You understand?
You don't let him loose
until she's with you, you got it?
And you don't wait for me, okay?
translation.es: Y no esperes por mí, ¿de acuerdo?

translation.en: - Yeah. - You'll be all right. You okay?
Yeah.
Creasy!
Creasy!
Creasy!
- You all right? - Yeah.
They didn't hurt you?
Hi.
All right, your mother's waiting for you. She's at the end the bridge.
translation.es: Bueno, tu mamá te está esperando. Está abajo del puente.

translation.en: - Okay, you go home. - Okay.
- All right. - Where are you going?
I'm going home too.
translation.es: Yo también me voy a casa.

translation.en: I'm going to Blue Bayou.
Hey.
I got something for you.
I got the last number too.
I love you, Creasy.
And you love me, don't you?
Yes, I do.
Now, come on, Pita, go.
- Go. Run. - Bye.
Pita!
- Mom! - Baby, come here! It's okay!
- Mom! - Come on.
Okay, I'll let you go now.
Mom!
